tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FreshProduceInventory (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE,
    alert_threshold INT
);

CREATE TABLE SupplierInventory ( 
    supplier_id INT, 
    product_id INT, 
    supplier_price DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    supply_date DATE, 
    PRIMARY KEY (supplier_id, product_id) 
);
